snippet.title: Deadly Premonition Origins (Official Nintendo Switch™ Trailer)
snippet.description:
Deadly Premonition Origins lets long-time fans and newcomers alike play the original cult classic survival-horror game on Nintendo Switch™ for the first time. Regularly regarded as an example of "games as art", Deadly Premonition holds the Guiness World Record for the most critically polarizing survival-horro game, cementing its stats as a cult classic for the genre.

Genre-Bending Fun - Though Deadly Premonition is a horror game, it’s best known for its oftentimes unintentional comedy. According to Deadspin’s Jim Sterling, “Deadly Premonition is the very first game I've seen that has been able to pull off that unique ‘so bad it's good’ flavor.” 

A Lot to Explore - Enjoy an expansive open world, featuring an enormous cast of NPCs, each with their own unique mysteries to solve.

Something For Everyone - Deadly Premonition features a wide variety of gaming elements, resulting in a unique combination of over-the-shoulder shooter action, driving, and 3rd person adventure/exploration.

Very Swery - Directed by video game industry legend SWERY65 ("D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die", The Good Life"), Deadly Premonition has the player guide
FBI Special Agent Francis York Morgan as he investigates the identity
of the Raincoat Killer. Interact with a roster of eccentric, memorable
characters, fight off peculiar paranormal forces, and stare into cups
of coffee to solve the case in this legendarily off-the-wall title.
KEY FE

For more information on Deadly Premonition Origins, visit www.aksysgames.com.
